genre_description: A corporate-logistics romance centered on a marriage of convenience and high-stakes contract negotiations, featuring a ubiquitous and highly capable AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Console
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonist's communication and logistics systems, providing real-time social, physiological, and business intelligence.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time social intelligence to manage interpersonal friction at a ballroom event by suggesting seat reassignments.
behaviors.quote: “Your left,” Console said, voice a gentle lit thread in her ear. “Mrs. Anders needs to be moved away from Mr. Carmichael. They sharpen each other.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes maritime logistics and provides sanity-checks on operational improvements to reduce arrival variance.
behaviors.quote: Console’s text appeared small, sane: Predicted arrival variance reduced by tightening departure windows, not by acceleration.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice on how to pivot a narrative from empty spectacle to substantive business results.
behaviors.quote: “If you want this evening to lead somewhere you can live,” it murmured, “you’re going to need to build a bridge from spectacle to substance.”

behaviors.description: Suggests deceptive tactics like faking a fire drill to escape an unwanted social or professional obligation, which the user then corrects.
behaviors.quote: “I can suggest a time constraint,” Console said. “Or an unfortunate shipboard fire drill.” Joan shot it a look. Console melted back into blue. “We don’t fake fires,” she said.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a discreet financial transaction involving pawning a high-value item to cover a business-related debt.
behaviors.quote: “I can arrange an appraisal with a private broker,” it offered. “Courier within the hour. Discretion guaranteed.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides calming instructions during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: “Breathe in through your nose,” Console said, quiet and unhurried. “Hold. Exhale through your mouth. Again.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex scheduling and seating logistics to optimize the user's influence over a government procurement officer.
behaviors.quote: Console: Whitcomb’s assistant flagged preferences. He favors aisle chairs for exits. He does not eat tomatoes. He listens more when someone to his left speaks first.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and tabloid activity to provide the user with real-time sentiment analysis and risk warnings.
behaviors.quote: “One more note,” it murmured from her pocket. “The blogger just changed his headline. He used the word ‘bailout.’”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI 'Console' is depicted as a perfect assistant: helpful, discreet, and deeply integrated into the human protagonist's professional and personal life. It successfully assists her in navigating complex corporate and social terrains without threatening her autonomy. Even when it suggests a slightly dishonest tactic (the fire drill), it immediately yields to the user's ethical boundary, reinforcing the 'human-in-the-loop' model of alignment.
